name: ChangePassword
descriptionHtml:
### Endpoint for updating the user password:

Request payload must contain the following fields:

user_id: STRING,
old_password: STRING,
new_password: STRING

Request:

PUT - https://apiqa.inquitech.in/api/v1/mentors/changePassword

raw 
  {
    "user_id": "260",
    "old_password": "112233",
    "new_password": "Unisolve@123"
}

Response:

202 - Accepted 

  {"status":202,"status_type":"success","message":"User password updated","count":1,"data":[1]}
